ygData.subject: Re: The Old Maximal Base
ygData.msgSnippet: As if being hit by a blunt object, the ping Tucson had been waiting for comes in loud and clear.  It jolts him into a startle, which causes him to jump back

As if being hit by a blunt object, the ping Tucson had been waiting for com=
es in loud and clear.  It jolts him into a startle, which causes him to jum=
p back slightly.  Instead of firing, he narrows his vacant eyes and moves h=
is head in the direction of the ping.  

" I got it!  Signal is very strong=
, and it seems to be scattered in all directions.  This could be good or no=
t so good.  Guardia's right, we have to stay out of the line of sight.  It'=
s a strong signal too.  If I don't turn down my sonar systems they'll dull =
my hearing capabilities.  Not to mention this is giving me one Hell of a pr=
ocessor ache!  C'mon, c'mon!  Give me a definite direction!  Where is the p=
rimary source of this signal?!"

He sends out another wave, and then, anoth=
er ping.  This time, from one direction , one source.  He turns himself tow=
ard it and points to it.

" That way.  It's coming from THAT direction.  Th=
e closser I go to it, the stronger it becomes."

He transforms.  He was qui=
te antsy to find out who or what the signal was bouncing off of.
